title: The Slow Club (Austrian group)
text:
The Slow Club is the name of a music project founded in 2004 by the Austrian musicians Hansi Lang, Thomas Rabitsch and Wolfgang Schl√∂gl.
Their music is influenced by electronic dance music and jazz.


== Discography ==


=== EPs ===
"Welcome to the Slow Club" (2004)


=== Albums ===

House of Sleep (2008)
